name: Golden Milk Cleanser with Turmeric , Vitamin C +  Black Cumin Seed Oil
about: What it is: A purifying and gentle cleanser that helps to unclog pores, deliver visible brightness, and support the skin barrier...Skin Type: Normal, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Dark Spots, Pores, and Acne and Blemishes..Highlighted Ingredients:- Turmeric: Revered in Ayurveda for visibly brightening and improving skin texture..- Black Cumin Seed Oil: Unclogs pores and fades the appearance of hyperpigmentation..- Oat Milk: Protects and replenishes the moisture barrier...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: This milky cleanser is rich in turmeric to visibly brighten and improve skin's texture while black cumin seed oil visibly fades hyperpigmentation. It will quickly lift away dirt and impurities and, like the drink from which it is inspired, will awaken your senses, and nourish your soul....CLEAN at Sephora is our commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing on effectiveness.
ingredients: -Turmeric: Revered in Ayurveda for visibly brightening and improving skin texture..-Black Cumin Seed Oil: Unclogs pores and fades the appearance of hyperpigmentation..-Oat Milk: Protects and replenishes the moisture barrier....Aqua (Water/Eau), Decyl Glucoside, Lecithin, Sodium Acrylates Copolymer, Nigella Sativa Seed Oil, Glycerin, Benzyl Alcohol, Coco-Glucoside, Dehydroacetic Acid, Citric Acid, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract, Glycol Distearate, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Extract, Hippophae Rhamnoides Fruit Juice....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Massage two to three pumps onto damp skin using gentle circular motions, avoiding the eye area..-Rinse thoroughly with warm water..-Ultra-effective when used alone or as the perfect second step in any double cleansing routine....Recycling Instructions:.-Rinse the bottle and recycle..-Rinse the pump if needed and drop off at your nearest Pact bin or discard as waste.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product as the second step in my cleansing routine and have been absolutely loving it! I have dry skin and this cleanser is gentle while providing a thorough and refreshing cleanse. My dry skin does not feel stripped or tight and overall I feel my skin looks bright, glowy and feels hydrated!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Such a gentle yet effective cleanser! Perfect for sensitive, dry skin.

reviews.review_title: Great for dry and tiref looking skin.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing. In the 2 wks that I have been using the cleanser I can see the difference it makes to my skin. I used to have dry and tired looking skin with a visble brown spot. Now, my skin is clear and glowing and the spot is starting to diminish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smells so nice and doesn't strip my skin but still leaves my skin feeling clean <3
I like this product! I feel like it's sinking into my skin. It is not greasy which I like.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Okay so Iu2019ll start by saying Iu2019ve been looking for a good cleanser for a while. I took a chance on this one and super happy I did. I will say itu2019s not great at removing makeup, so this is definitely a second cleanse kind of product. But their oil cleanser gets alllllll my makeup off. It cleanses without feeling stripped and tight. Also, I actually really love the turmeric smell, it makes me feel like Iu2019m at the spa.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A great gentle cleanser that leaves my face feeling very moisturized and my skin feeling soft. I have sensitive skin and this didn't bother it one bit. Feels like a very high end cleanser and smells great as a bonus!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I started using this product a couple weeks ago and itu2019s been an excellent addition to my routine. I find it to be a gentle and really effective cleanser. As someone with sensitive skin Iu2019ve really appreciated how itu2019s not a harsh cleanser and makes my skin feel hydrated after use.

reviews.review_title: Gentle, leaves my skin feeling fresh and clean
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Have been using this product for a few weeks now.  Love the smell, it is earthy and calming. Leaves my face feeling clean but very gentle on my skin.   Part of my morning and evening routine.
It made my skin worse and no results. Waste of money and I wish I could get my money back.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it- I don't often finish my cleansers because my sister works in beauty and she gives me all sort of things to try but I held onto this till the very last drop.  Leaves your skin hydrated but you can feel the cleanser happening.  The smell is turmeric. earthy and holistic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this while shopping online at Sahajan ( I just discovered this brand and I love it).  I like the smell feels very therapeutic and it really does a great job cleansing.  I wouldn't use it for makeup removal though- their oil cleanser is better for eye makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this product, it definitely smells really nice and felt good on my skin but it didn't feel like it was cleansing my skin at all. Also didn't remove any makeup,  so I'm returning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My mom uses Sahajan products and loves them! She got this for me to try as I've had challenges with my skincare regime this summer! I love it! The bottle is beautiful, easy to use pump and I love the black cumin in it! My face feels super clean and refreshed!

reviews.review_title: The best cleanser Iu2019ve ever used
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve had sensitive/breakout-prone skin for years, so Iu2019m always hesitant to try a new skincare line, but after a friend recommended Sahajan, I decided to give it a try. Wow u2014 I love this cleanser. It leaves my skin feeling clean, fresh, and moisturized u2014 not tight and dry like others Iu2019ve used. This will be my go-to cleanser from now on. I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve tried endless skincare lines and products, lots of the popular and more expensive ones. This is the first product Iu2019ve found that doesnu2019t leave me either with tight dry skin or overly oily! Iu2019ve bought 3 of their other products as well and Iu2019m obsessed! Scent is strong but itu2019s very nice and earthy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is THE PERFECT cleanser for anyone looking for a gentle and efficacious product that removes make up, dirt and grime from a long day, while visibly improving the appearance of discoloration on the skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The customer service from Sahajan is absolutely terrible. The packaging on one of their products failed and completely ruined my bag some of the contents.

reviews.review_title: This might just be my new go-to
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The smell is just what youu2019d hope for if you like natural scents. Itu2019s refreshing and light, not overpowering at all, which is a big plus. This cleanser does exactly what it promises. It cleans well without that tight, stripped feeling afterward!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love it. Smells nice, like turmeric tea. Gentle cleanse left my face feeling soft and moisturized.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My acne-prone skin LOVES this cleanser. I love the combination of Turmeric, Vitamin C, and Black Cumin Seed Oil. I've noticed my acne improve without the risk of becoming overly dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gentle yet effective at removing light makeup! Absolutely love the scent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this cleanser.  It was lightweight but perfect for my normal skin.  It is a must for me for my daily face ritual

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product! It left my skin feeling clean, fresh and glowing! Will definitely be adding this to my regular routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great cleanser, doesnu2019t make your skin feel dry and the skin feels clean after using it. Doesn't have your typical smell of a cleanser. Overall definitely will buy it again.

reviews.review_text: Was skeptical at first as cleansing milk never really worked on my skin but wow.   No breakouts. Skin plumped and hydrated. A must try.  A

reviews.review_text: A wonderful brightening cleanser Thin in texture and leaves the skin feeling very clean, with a eucalyptus/ spa-like scent.

reviews.review_text: Great mild cleansers that leaves my dry/sensitive skin feeling clean and moisturized.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After using the cleanser, my sensitive skin felt very happy. It didnu2019t not break me out and it removed my makeup very well. It leaves you with a smooth skin and does not dry the face, which I love! If you want a smooth, clean and hydrated feel, this cleanser  is it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely lovely!  This leaves my face feeling fresh and healthy.  I have received so many compliments on my skin since Iu2019ve started using Sahajan products.  Iu2019ve been told my skin looks radiant!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is a must have! The consistency is perfect. As someone with sensitive skin, this product did not break me out or cause any rash/redness

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Feels like a daily indulgence - works great for my skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I pair this with the Sahajan Essential Cleansing Oil and it is a fresh finish to my cleansing routine. Leaves skin feeling clean, tingling and hydrated, they are a perfect 1-2 punch!

reviews.review_title: A must have in my skincare routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser! My skin feels refreshed and looks noticeably more radiant after each use.  Plus it's perfect for sensitive skin linke mine. HIghly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved how soft and glowy this made my skin look! Didnu2019t feel like it stripped my skin of the natural oils like many other cleansers Iu2019ve tried.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser has been a delightful addition to my skincare routine! It's incredibly gentle on my sensitive skin, effortlessly removes makeup, and leaves behind a refreshing turmeric scent. After using it for two weeks, I've noticed a visible improvement in reducing discoloration from past acne scars. I wholeheartedly recommend this product to anyone looking for a gentle yet effective cleanser.This cleanser has been a delightful addition to my skincare routine! It's incredibly gentle on my sensitive skin, effortlessly removes makeup, and leaves behind a refreshing turmeric scent. After using it for two weeks, I've noticed a visible improvement in reducing discoloration from past acne scars. I wholeheartedly recommend this product to anyone looking for a gentle yet effective cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This gives you a refreshing, clean feeling to your face.  A tingling sensation.  Highly recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved it so much have given it to others as gifts!!
Makes your skin feel so clean and soft. Perfect for daily use twice a day through all seasons.
Really like this product, definitely recommend. Makes my face feel clean and smooth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice gentle cleanser for my sensitive skin. I like to follow up with this as a second step after my oil cleanser and I love how soft my skin feels afterwards! Also obsessed with its earthy/turmeric scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wonderful cleanser, it leaves my face feeling clean and smells wonderful. My daughter told me to use it after the company's Oil cleanser, and I noticed even more of an improvement! Big fan of this product

reviews.review_title: 5/5 best cleanser for my acne-prone, senstive skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who has rosacea with sensitive, dry, and acne-prone skin, it is very difficult to find cleansers that work for me. I LOVE this cleanser!  Itu2019s so gentle but also cleans my makeup off effectively. I have used this for double cleansing in the last few weeks. My acne cleared up, my skin feels softer, and my skin looks less red and a lot brighter. Cannot rave about this product enough!
Lovely gentle cleanser that cleanses my skin, but doesn't feel stripping.

reviews.review_title: My face has never felt more alive!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Every time I use this cleanser, my face feels so much more detoxified. I just love the use of turmeric and vitamin C to unclog my pores and leave my face feeling so much more alive. This really has changed the game in the skincare industry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This left my skin feeling refreshed and smells realllyy good! I used the brightening mask after too, great combo

reviews.review_title: A must have in my morning routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Golden Milk Cleanser is my morning cleanser love the way it makes my skin feel

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Sahajan, you need to go viral. This cleanser smelled amazing, my face felt clean, and it didn't feel too harsh at all on my sensitive skin! People need to shed light on this business! #supportbrownbusinesses.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells nice and makes my face feel clean, but it didn't fix any of my skin concerns. Might be the perfect product for someone else.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Six stars!! This cleanser is exactly what I've been looking for in a make-up remover and cleanser. For bonus points, it also nourishes my skin and my few dark spots seem to be fading. The fragrance is natural and calming. It feels so great to start and end every day by cleansing and feeding my skin. Love it! Recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy the light creamy texture of this cleanser, you donu2019t need a whole of it to wash your face/neck. It leaves my skin feeling purified without being stripped. Great for daily use :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My new favorite face cleanser!! It is so gentle and hydrating I really feel like my skin barrier is protected while it gives a deep cleanse. No stripping feeling at all but still breaks down makeup really well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Use this milk cleanser with natural ingredients leaving my skin feeling soft and nourished.  Highly recommend to friends and family.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am honestly very basic with my cleansers and follow the latest trends typically. This cleanser was way out of my comfort zone and Iu2019m never going backu2026. itu2019s sooooo soft and smooth! I actually feel like it CLEANS my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super gentle and great for my sensitive combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I donu2019t use a lot of cleansers because I always feel dry afterwards but this one is so gentle and leaves my skin softer and nourished. Definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: love the all natural ingredients of this skin care line-- stuff your skin won't react to.

reviews.review_title: Perfect for oily or acne prone skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Such an invigorating cleanse. Skin feels super clean after using this. And beautiful aroma as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser! Itu2019s really gentle on my skin but effective! Iu2019ve noticed now that my skin has a glow in the mornings when I use it. Iu2019m definitely incorporating this product into my everyday routine because itu2019s one of the few products that doesnu2019t irritate me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Another beautiful cleanser by this brand. I usually will use this in combination with the Essential Cleansing Oil and the pairing is the best. It helps unclog pores and leaves my skin feeling fresh and hydrated. This product has served up more glow that is for sure! :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I canu2019t say enough about this miracle cleanser! I have major struggles with hyper pigmentation and this golden milk cleanser has significantly improved my skin and a big dark spot has nearly disappeared. love love, love this cleanser. It is a must try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love the feeling of this cleansing cream. I especially love the feeling of super clean and unclogged skin. I use it after using the cleansing oil. The two work perfectly as a cleansing duo.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the scent of this product - super calming and relaxing - and you donu2019t need a lot of it to get a great lather, which I love too

I use this every single night!! Takes the u201cday offu201d without drying - leaves my skin feeling smooth and soft. Itu2019s just excellent. (Also pairs really well with the oil cleanser for heavy makeup days.)

reviews.review_title: My fave cleanser of all time
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is definitely my go-to cleanser, and it works so well. It smells great too, and I massage it into my skin before rinsing it away with warm water and a gentle cloth. Follow with Sahajan's Balance Toner. Great stuff.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for something gentle, natural and effective.  This cleanser is all 3, and I love how my skin looks after using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very lovely cleanser!   The consistency is like a cream cleanser, not too thick or too thin. It doesn't feel super oily or leave behind a film. It also doesn't dry out the skin either. Very balanced cleaner for everyone.   A little goes a long way. I started with a full pump and found that to be too much. 1/2 pump works great. It doesn't lather but feels great on the skin. I would use this to get off makeup (maybe super light makeup) but is lovely as a daily cleaner or second cleanse.  The scent is predominantly tumeric so if you're not found of super herbal scents, might not be for you. The scent doesn't linger after you wash it off.
This is an amazing cleanser! Love the fact itu2019s a clean product which leaves my skin feeling refreshed and clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really a fantastic cleanser! I have sensitive skin and it doesn't irritate me at all. The tumeric smells nice and honestly, I have seen a visible improvement to my skin! It has lightened my past acne scars and makes me feel more confident about my skin. Will be buying this again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm Asian and pigmentation and discolouration are my biggest concerns. So I love how this cleanser addresses my biggest problems!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is amazing, i find a single pump is enough to clean my face, make it feel fresh and brighten it. The consistency and texture of the cleanser is perfect!

reviews.review_title: Stand out cleanser- I swear by it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is incredible. After using it for a week, I could see the immediate difference on my face. My skin look brighter, and my acne started to minimize my skin is looking much clearer. Half way done!
After only two uses of this product, I could see the difference on my face. My skin was brighter cleaner, and my acne scars seem lighter.ufffcufffc

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This with the cleansing oil is amazing. Love how gentle this is without the feeling of my skin being stripped. My skin feels fresh. I have aging combo dry skin & itu2019s great for cleaning the t-zone

reviews.review_title: Great product, not my fav scent.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this product and while it works well, I didn't love the scent of the product so it wasn't my favorite. Normally I don't mind different scents in products but this one I just couldn't handle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For my double cleanse, I have never used two products from the same line because they rarely both work so well. The Sahajan Cleansing Oil and Golden Milk Cleanser pair together beautifully - removes makeup and cleans without stripping my skin. A little product goes a long way too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the most fantastic cleanser. It does not dry your skin, leaving it smooth and even.  It is gentle enough for the eye area and still manages to take away the layers of make up and dirt. A must!

I live on a double cleanse routine. I use this as my second cleanse (the first is the Sahajan oil cleanser) -- I especially love this one because of the turmeric, it has really helped to brighten up my skin. I swear my skin has never been clearer since I started the double cleanse routine with these products!
I wasnu2019t sure when I first got this cleanser- but then I used it and itu2019s really helped with my adult acne and my pores.  Smells great- like a healthy drink.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_text: I've been using this cleanser in my double cleanse routine - it begins as a gel and turns milky.  It's gentle but gives a thorough clean without over stripping. I find it great before applying serums and the addition of turmeric is a nice bonus.  Like all of the Sahajan products I use, the experience is overall very calming and relaxing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had been looking for a cleanser to add to my routine specifically targeting my skin discolouration and pores. What convinced me to try it are the natural ingredients, but what's made me write a review after nearly finishing my first bottle is that it actually works! The cleanser is light, creamy and very gentle on my skin. I have noticed some fading in my dark spots which I believe is the combination of turmeric and vitamin C doing its job. I'll definitely be re-purchasing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser has been so gentle and refreshing on my sensitive skin. It removes my makeup so smoothly, leaves my dry skin feeling soft and gives a brightening effect. I like using it in a double cleansing process

reviews.review_title: Yoga in a bottle, but for your face !
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with this cleanser - the scent of it in particular immediately relaxes me and puts me at ease, and also leaves my skin glowing!  About to buy my 2nd bottle, it has become my go to morning cleanser

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Many cleansers I've tried leave my skin feeling completely stripped of moisture and tight. This milk cleanser is magic in a bottle! It retains the good stuff and removes the bad. After cleansing, my skin feels fresh and replenished. Such great value for the price point too!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My skin has never felt better after using this cleanser. It uses turmeric to brighten my skin and black cumin oil to unclog pores. I also love knowing it's made of clean products.
